title: Filter Male Users Over 18 Years Old
description: This code demonstrates a JavaScript function that filters an array of users to select only those who are male and over 18 years old.
output: [ { name: 'Harkirat', age: 21, gender: 'male' }, { name: 'Raman', age: 22, gender: 'male' }, { name: 'Ramesh', age: 19, gender: 'male' } ]
